body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Virginia native. Son of Jaret and Jane Justice. Farm hand in Carter County in 1860. Served in the Sandy Valley Battalion of the 1st Regiment Capital Guards (U.S.A.) as a private from June 17, 1864 to August 28, 1864. Reported as deserted on August 28, 1864.
